title: Dr Moned's Icons and Art
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[module CSS]]
:root {
    --background: linear-gradient(0.25turn, #89928a, #cfcfcc , #89928a);
    /* A grey gradient */
    --pale-accent: 91,107,107;
    /* light grey, for visited links (an unvisited) */
    --bright-accent: 171, 186, 186;
    /* bright grey */
    --medium-accent: 118, 142, 142;
    /* medium/light grey - the "default" accent color */
    --dark-accent: 89, 99, 99;
    /* dark grey */
    --alt-accent: 118, 124, 124;
    /* light grey */
}
[[/module]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
+ Welcome to my page of art! I have bountiful amounts of ACS icons, and a few other SCP and Tale art further down. I hope you enjoy!
[[/=]]

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:solid 1px #000000; background:#F2F2F2; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
[[=]]
++ Icons!

All esoteric classes can be found [[[esoteric-classes-complete-list| here]]]. 
I may do some more, but if any are lacking be sure to check out [[[greyve-art-page|Greyve's icons]]] or [[[calibri-s-mega-cool-art-page-it-s-mostly-just-icons-but-what|Calibold's icons!]]]
[[/=]]
||~ Icon ||~ Esoteric class ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Aidos.png width="100px"]] || **Aidos:** Items are at risk of becoming permanently neutralized and are currently receiving aid from the Foundation to prevent this. ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Anomalous.png width="100px"]] || **Anomalous:** Item is so simplistic that it is not assigned an official database file. ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Conscientia.png width="100px"]] || **Conscientia:** Item cannot be physically contained, necessitating that the public be led to believe it is non-anomalous.[[footnote]]Made for [[*user Voiiiii]][[/footnote]] ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Continua.png width="100px"]] || **Continua:** Item is drastically affected due to the disappearance of a specific part of the anomaly. ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Dependant.png width="100px"]] || **Dependant:** Item is legally dependent upon the Foundation. ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Gleipnir.svg width="100px"]] || **Gleipnir:**  Item continuously requires different/new forms of containment, thereby precluding standard classification. ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Heimal.png width="100px"]] || **Hiemal:** Item is a system of two or more distinct but related anomalies that keep each other under control. ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Ignosi.png width="100px"]] || **Ignosi:** Item's discovery, even by the Foundation, must be prevented. ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Lucian.png width="100px"]] || **Lucian:** Item is an event in history where no amnesticisation is required.[[footnote]]Made for [[*user Voiiiii]][[/footnote]] ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Maksur.png width="100px"]] || **Maksur:** Item has been separated into several anomalous parts which must be kept separate. [[footnote]]Made for [[*user Cyvstvi]][[/footnote]] ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Mendax.png width="100px"]] || **Mendax:** Knowledge of the item cannot be maintained. Self Concealing. ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Skoll.png width="100px"]] || **Sköll:** Item is in a process that will result in neutralization, indefinite breach, or both. ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Terminal.svg width="100px"]] || **Terminal:** Item incorporates human beings following their death. ||
||  [[image  https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Uncontained.svg width="100px"]] || **Uncontained:** The anomaly is not currently in containment. ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Yesod.png width="100px"]] || **Yesod/Radix:** Item has been integrated into the Foundation's command structure.[[footnote]] Upon request by [[*user DrHawkwind]][[/footnote]] ||

@@ @@
[[=]]
**Below are some of my own creations that I hope to feature soon:**
[[/=]]

||~ Icon ||~ Esoteric class ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Damnum.png width="90px"]] || **Damnum:** Items that cause cross-timeline contamination. This encompasses from items crossing timelines, to huge tears in reality. ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Efla.png width="90px"]] || **Efla:** An anomaly that is created and utilised by the Foundation. Containment difficulty is dependent on circumstances of anomalies utilization and may change regularly during testing and/or usage. ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Tempus.png width="90px"]] || **Tempus:**   Tempus anomalies have the potential to escape containment by travelling back in time, likely also causing a [[[http://www.sf-encyclopedia.com/entry/jonbar_point| Jonbar hinge]]] within baseline reality. ||
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:solid 1px #000000; background:#F2F2F2; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
[[=]]
++ Custom Risk Class!

Due to custom risk classes becoming a thing thanks in large part to [[[component:customizable-acs|Calibold's cool ACS addon]]] they now need icons!

||~ Icon ||~ Risk Class ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Celit.png width="80px"]] || **Celit:** The nature of the danger that this SCP presents is unable to be detailed.[[footnote]] Made for [[*user LizardWizard]][[/footnote]] ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Nus.png width="80px"]] || **Nus:** The nature of the danger that this SCP presents is constantly shifting.||
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:solid 1px #000000; background:#F2F2F2; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
[[=]]
++ Nexus Icons

Needed a Dunwich icon for my 8kcon entry, might do more, who knows.

||~ Icon ||~ Nexus Class ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Dunwich.svg width="100px"]] || **Dunwich:** A Class-4 Nexus. The Nexus is almost entirely cut off from the non-anomalous world. Special measures may be required to keep personnel safe. ||
[[/=]]
[[/div]]


@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:solid 1px #000000; background:#F2F2F2; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
[[=]]
++ Was busy procrastinating about other things, so made a few K-Class scenario icons!

All info about K-Class Scenarios can be found [[[k-class-complete-list|here.]]]

||~ Icon ||~ K Class ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/ADKIcon.png width="200px"]] || **ADK-Class 'Complete Anomalous Destabilization' Scenario:** _
Anomalies reclaim the earth, typically after another K class causing humanity's dominance to fall. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/GHIcon.png width="200px"]] || **GH-0 'Dead Greenhouse' scenario:** _
Humans are endangered/extinct but Earth is still fit for habitation. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/HKIcon.png width="200px"]] || **HK-Class 'Deific Subjugation' scenario:** _
A god shows up and takes over. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/IKIcon.png width="200px"]] || **IK-Class 'Collapse of Global Civilization' Scenario:** _
Civilization collapses. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/%C3%96%C3%9FIcon.png width="200px"]] || **Öß-Class 'Multi-Universal Amalgamation' Scenario:** _
Another universe/timeline interacts and destablizes our own. ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/PTIcon.png width="200px"]] || **PT-Class 'Paradoxical Time Breakdown' Scenario:** _
An event where a harmful time paradox has occurred causing time and/or the timeline to be "broken". ||
|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/XKIcon.png width="200px"]] || **XK-Class 'End-of-the-World' Scenario:** _
Most common and broadest meaning, covers just about any apocalypse. Religious apocalypse, humanity destroyed, Earth destroyed, the universe destroyed, etc. ||
[[/=]]
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:solid 1px #000000; background:#F2F2F2; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
[[=]]
++ Other small artworks:
[[/=]]
||~ -=-=-=-=- ||~ -=-=-=-=- ||~ -=-=-=-=- ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Factory%20Icon.png width="200px"]] || [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Nosy%20Coworkers2.png width="200px"]] || [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Site%205%20doesn%27t%20exist.png width="200px"]] ||
|| A little Factory icon || Icon for Pi-7 (Nosey Coworkers) || Some art of SCP-4182 ||
||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/Chaos.png width="200px"]]||  [[image https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-icons-and-art/CoinmasterIcon.png width="200px"]]|| [[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/dr-moned-s-temporal-pocket-universe/ArchivistsTransparent width="200px"]] ||
|| Some Chaos Insurgency art || The Coinmaster from my [[[the-factory-is-hungry-for-more| Factory tale]]] || A logo for my (potential) GoI!||
[[/div]]
